name: 矿老板模拟器
description:
Game Introduction

Decentralization is the key path to break through the industry methodology. Therefore, the currency circle is a value conversion platform for attribution analysis and quantification, and achieves perception through vertical fields and moats. Translated into adult words, it is a stud in the currency circle, so in this work, you can play a mine boss, set up a mine, buy mining machines, mine currency, and make a lot of money. At the same time, as a qualified mine owner, you must not only know how to snatch graphics cards against stinky games, but also have sufficient financial training, know how to hedge risks, manage market value, allocate funds outside the market, and increase leverage.

Synopsis

The game follows the plot of "Lick Dog Simulator", which tells a series of stories that happened after Lao Sirun arrived in the United States. In the previous work, many old friends will all appear, and new characters will also be added. At the same time, the "dog licking simulator universe" also ushered in the most sinister, cunning, evil-doing villain who hides a knife in a smile - Egg Studio. They covet players' achievements in the field of cryptocurrency, and use various insidious means to calculate players, and want to take all the players' wealth for themselves.

Software introduction

Mining machine management software: Players can rent mining farms here, buy mining machines, or manage their own mining machines, allowing them to mine for themselves day and night.
Songsong Coin Circle: The currency circle trading software named by Mr. Song Song, where players can sell their own cryptocurrencies, or trade cryptocurrencies directly.
Songsong Futures Link: Futures trading software also named by Mr. Songsong, players can use futures to hedge risks, hedge or add leverage.
WSSB Forum: Mr. Ye Wen’s main battlefield, a platform for cryptocurrency players from all walks of life to exchange investment experiences. With a powerful matrix, Mr. Ye Wen can manipulate the forum’s wind direction, so as to achieve the purpose of controlling the currency circle.
Shocked Financial News: Players can learn the latest market information here, make different investment strategies through reasonable analysis and judgment, and at the same time, they can buy the editor-in-chief to release soft articles to control the price trend of cryptocurrencies.
Crab Crab Cloud Music: If you are tired from fighting in the market, put some relaxing music to ease your mood.
Cannonball Mail: The brother product of Cannonball SMS, players can send and receive messages here and contact people from all walks of life.
The World's No. 1 Bank: Cash flow is not open, do you want to cross the bridge? It is right to borrow from the world's first bank. At the same time, the bank also opened the deposit business.
